DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and the safety of paclitaxel given weekly in patients with advanced or recurrent breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study of Weekly Paclitaxel (BMS-181339) in Patient With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with primary advanced inoperable disease who were refractory to chemotherapy Patients with recurrent disease following postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy Patients who were not amenable to postrecurrence chemotherapy Patients with serious, uncontrolled medical illness Patients with previous therapy with taxanes
